# userInfo

**Instance Property**

A dictionary you use to customize the encoding process by providing contextual information.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency var userInfo: [CodingUserInfoKey : any Sendable] { get set }
```

## Customizing Encoding

- **outputFormat**: A value that determines which property list format is used during encoding.

items.description: A value that determines which property list format is used during encoding.
items.name: outputFormat
